LISTEN UP QUICKSTRIKE!  IT WAS AT LEAST A WEEK  BEFORE ANYONE SAID 
THAT MY CHAR DIDN'T EXIST(they said other things and mentioned other 
modes but never directly challenged that) AND SO I'M NOT ABOUT TO BACK 
DOWN! IN MY MEMORY I DON'T REMEMBER ANY COUNCIL MEMBER FLAT OUT SAYING 
THEY DON'T EXIST!  I WAS A NEWBIE WHEN I MADE THEM AND FURTHERMORE IF 
YOU SAY THEY DON'T EXIST THEN WHY IN THE HECK IS ICE AT MAXIMAL CITY, 
AND IN THE STRICK LAWS OF PHYSICS NONE OF OUR CHARACTERS EXIST!  I 
RETHOUGHT THEIR BACKSTORY AND WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THIS!  THEY WERE ON 
EARTH ALL  THIS TIME WITH AN IDEA THERE MIGHT BE OTHER TRANSFORMERS 
BUT NEVER ACTUALLY SAW (except for that "Carnitrons post and Megaton) 
ANY SINCE THEY STAYED IN THE SAME PLACE FOR A LONG TIME. I WAS JUST 
TO LAZY TO PUT IT UP UNTIL NOW!  YOU CAN ELIMINATE MOST OF MY OLD 
POSTS DUE TO THAT, BUT NOT QUESTION THEIR EXISTENCE (this is my 
technique in most debates bore the guy until he's sick of the whole 
thing effective huh?)!

Mustex:

Mustex runs up to perceptor, and flashes his Maximal icon.

Mustex:SHOW ME YOURS OR PREPARE TO DIE!
